Summary: Very low Triangle with multi-colored pulsing Orbs in each corner over shore of Lake Erie
divs: Sighting DetailsI am blown away, i just got back from a trip to Lake Erie, I just witnessed and filmed a very low Triangle with multi-colored pulsing Orbs in each corner over shore of Lake Erie. This Triangle frew right over me very low I have unbelievable film footage of the Event, Historic footage actually.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Euclid
There were no other sightings in Euclid on or around April 6th 2010
